bifurcation_patterns.description: Exponential value injection through dimensional resonance, cross-pollination, temporal cascades, and synergy detection

dimensional_resonance.description: When a dimension improves, related dimensions benefit (MICRO level only)

DIM02.rationale: Strategic alignment enables financial planning clarity

DIM02.description: Finance (DIM02) reinforces Alignment (DIM01) and enables Execution (DIM05)

DIM01.rationale: Shared beliefs enable consensus on direction

DIM04.rationale: Prior beliefs inform causal model construction

DIM03.rationale: Causal models validate or challenge prior beliefs

DIM06.rationale: Causal clarity improves evidence collection design

DIM05.description: Execution (DIM05) depends on Finance (DIM02) and generates Evidence (DIM06)

DIM06.description: Evidence (DIM06) validates Causality (DIM04) and guides Execution (DIM05)

DIM04.rationale: Evidence confirms or refutes causal hypotheses

cross_pollination.description: When fixing PA01 partially fixes PA03 (shared structural dependencies)

PA01-PA03.rationale: Both rely on strategic planning and institutional design
intervention_sequence: Then: PA03 governance structures benefit from clearer direction

PA02-PA05.rationale: Financial planning connects directly to execution capacity
intervention_sequence: First: Improve PA02 financial clarity and budgeting
Then: PA05 execution benefits from resource availability
Then: PA04 monitoring can track performance effectively

DIM01-to-DIM03.effect: Improved alignment enables better belief calibration

DIM04-to-DIM06.effect: Causal models improve evidence collection design

CL01-to-CL02.effect: Core capacity extends to adjacent clusters

synergy_detection.description: Two interventions together > sum of parts
synergy_detection.mechanism: product of (1 + pair_strength) for all synergistic pairs

same_pa_different_dim.description: Same policy area, different dimensions have natural synergy

different_pa_same_dim.description: Different policy areas sharing dimension have moderate synergy

same_cluster.description: MESO level: same cluster recommendations have high synergy

components.cascade_bonus: sum(tc.multiplier - 1.0) for order > 1, capped at max_cascade_bonus
